interpretation:
The "see-no-evil monkey" emoji represents the concept of avoiding or ignoring something that is uncomfortable or unpleasant. It can signify a desire to avoid confrontation or to remain ignorant of certain truths. This card may also indicate a need for discretion or secrecy, as the monkey is covering its eyes to avoid being seen. 

In a reading, this card may suggest that the querent is turning a blind eye to a situation that requires attention or action. It could also indicate that they are keeping secrets or hiding something from others. Alternatively, it may suggest that the querent is practicing healthy boundaries and choosing not to engage in drama or negativity.
